trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Raymond
There were no other sightings in Raymond on or around May 22nd 2010
Summary: Observed a bright star-like object 10-15miles away fading in and out periodically.
divs: sighting detailsi observed a bright star-like objcet in the sky the night of may 22nd 2010 while standing outside of my apt. building. i was told about this object the previous night around 9pm. i watched this object for about 30 minutes around 10:30pm 5\22\10. i witnessesd the object fade in and out a few times and eventually vanished from sight. the second event took place on the night of 6\1\10. this same ufo has been sighted numerous times in the same general area. the second time i witnessed the ufo navigate in my direction then change course and disappear out of sight. as the object changed positions i had to go up to the 3rd floor of my apt. building to follow it. when i came back downstairs the ufo was completely out of sight.
